IMU Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Guest Faculty Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 23, 2025, 15:21 IST
 Indian Maritime University
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 23-Aug-2025 |  Tamil Nadu |  Salary : 70,000 to 100,000




FOLLOW

The Indian Maritime University (IMU) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Guest Faculty Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.E./M. Tech in Electrical, Electronics Engineering can apply for the IMU Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Tamil Nadu.

IMU Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Guest Faculty	01	M.E./M. Tech in Electrical, Electronics Engineering

IMU Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 60 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

IMU Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

IMU Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

IMU Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 70,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 1,00,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the IMU Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the IMU Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	23-08-2025
Closing date	31-08-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
